about_the_game:
Save the children while you save the future of mankind!

The Children's Miracle Network Extra Life backpack will give your in-game hero a health bonus while the proceeds of the purchase go towards the Children's Miracle Network to help sick kids.

To find out more about how you can participate in the Children's Miracle Network please visit

This backpack is our pledge to help give back to the community. We at Strength in Numbers Studios believe in helping others live happy and healthy lives and are proud to be a part of helping the Children's Miracle Network.
detailed_description:
Save the children while you save the future of mankind!

The Children's Miracle Network Extra Life backpack will give your in-game hero a health bonus while the proceeds of the purchase go towards the Children's Miracle Network to help sick kids.

To find out more about how you can participate in the Children's Miracle Network please visit

This backpack is our pledge to help give back to the community. We at Strength in Numbers Studios believe in helping others live happy and healthy lives and are proud to be a part of helping the Children's Miracle Network.
name: Extra Life Backpack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Tri-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5GB GDDR5 Dedicated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Backpack DLC for Tuebor: I Will Defend
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz 6 or 8 Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB GDDR5 Dedicated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Backpack DLC for Tuebor: I Will Defend

short_description: The Children's Miracle Network Extra Life backpack will give your in-game hero a health bonus while the proceeds of the purchase go towards the Children's Miracle Network to help sick kids.
